subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Travis d’Arnaud had three hits, including run-scoring singles in the first and the ninth, and the Mets came out of the All-Star break with their ninth victory in 11 games.
snippet: Travis d’Arnaud had three hits, including run-scoring singles in the first and the ninth, and the Mets came out of the All-Star break with their ninth victory in 11 games.
